titleStmt.title: Poems lyrique, macaronique, heroique, &c. by Henry Bold ...
titleStmt.author: Bold, Henry, 1627-1683.

notesStmt.note: The volume ends with the words, "Expect the second part". This part apparently never appeared, unless his "Latine songs, with their English", published in 1685, forms the second part.
Reproduction of original in Folger Library.
